meanings.definition: A person who has a net worth of over one billion dollars.
meanings.sent1: The superbillionaire donated a large sum of money to charity.
meanings.sent2: The superbillionaire owns multiple luxurious mansions around the world.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted to be friends with the superbillionaire.
meanings.sent4: Her success in the tech industry made her a superbillionaire overnight.
meanings.sent5: The media always covers the lavish lifestyle of the superbillionaire.

meanings.definition: The state of being extremely wealthy, typically with assets exceeding one billion dollars.
meanings.sent1: His hard work and investments led to his superbillionaire status.
meanings.sent2: The superbillionaire's wealth allowed them to travel first class everywhere.
meanings.sent3: Even the superbillionaire was surprised by the extravagant price of the yacht.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, reaching superbillionaire status is a rare achievement.
meanings.sent5: The superbillionaire's wealth was so vast, it seemed endless.
